title: Cross-functional Frontend Developer
description: As a cross-team frontend developer, I’m not assigned to a single team; instead, I move between many of them, wherever I’m needed most. Sometimes I work purely as a developer, and other times I also help guide the frontend team. I mainly build solutions for Inditex. Main technologies: TypeScript, CSS, React, React Query, Vitest, Cypress, GitHub Actions, Copilot.
